name: Metaverse Hub
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Metaverse Hub is here to usher in a new era of NFT/Metaverse centric DeFi experience on Cronos. The native currency of this expanding hub of metaverse is the $MHUB token. $MHUB will be used for everything you do at the CRODEX Metaverse Hub —, assets and artifacts you purchase/sell, participation tickets you’ll acquire and more.
